SELECT wgm.join_time, wgm.type, wgm.join_scene, CASE WHEN wgm.type=1 THEN ( SELECT wu.user_name FROM we_user wu WHERE wu.user_id=wgm.user_id ) WHEN wgm.type = 2 THEN ( SELECT wc.name FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.external_userid=wgm.user_id ) END memberName FROM we_group_member wgm
and wgm.chat_id = #{chatId} and HAVING wc.`name` like concat('%', #{memberName}, '%')
